subject: Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Charles W. Smith Jr., 81, who revived the program in 1968, will take several days off from managing the sports center on campus to join the team at the Frozen Four.
snippet: Charles W. Smith Jr., 81, who revived the program in 1968, will take several days off from managing the sports center on campus to join the team at the Frozen Four.
